name: Mizuryon
description: A majestic water tiger with a liquid crystal body. Its fluid form allows it to move with incredible speed and strike with surgical precision, making every attack a potential critical hit.

ability.name: Liquid Body
ability.description: Speed is increased by 50% and critical hit ratio is doubled. Water-type moves have increased accuracy

moves.name: Hydro Claw
moves.description: Slashes with claws made of pressurized water. High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.description: Lunges at the target with incredible speed. Always goes first.

moves.name: Tidal Wave
moves.description: Crashes into the target like a massive wave. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Precision Strike
moves.description: A perfectly aimed attack that always results in a critical hit.

habitat: Crystal clear rivers and mountain springs
